actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain applications and other documents required to be filed with executive departments and agencies shall be considered as timely filed if they are timely mailed.

summary.text: Provides that specified applications and other documents required to be filed for a grant, loan, or other assistance with executive departments and agencies shall be considered as timely filed if they are timely mailed. Directs the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to prescribe regulations for the uniform application of the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain applications and other documents required to be filed with executive departments and agencies shall be considered as timely filed if they are timely mailed.
